features: 😍LED Desk Lamp with Built-in Wireless Charger: Modern black desk light with 10W wireless charger & pen holder. It works for compatible iPhones, Samsung, and part of devices and fast-charge your smartphone at 10W. A 5V/3A power adapter delivers optimum charging and stable lighting too. Note: An overly thick phone case may affect wireless charging; Does not support Qi EPP (do not work for the phone of Google Pixel 4a 5G)

❤️Desk Lamps for Home Office with 3 Color Modes & Stepless Dimming: Sailstar black desk lamp provides different colors to let you choose warm light, excellent light, or daylight to meet all your learning, work, and life scenario requirements. You also get dimming options within each color choice, and the sensitive touch controls help you change the modes easily. Long press to adjust the lamp’s brightness (from 5%-100%), or short click to adjust the color.

👁️‍🗨️Eye-caring LED Desk Lighting: Super bright black office desk lamps features lots of LED beads that provide 8W lighting at a max output of 800 lumens. They have an 85+ CRI rate and 50,000 hours lifespan. An acrylic panel emits soft, non-ghosting, and non-flickering light that helps prevent eye tiredness even used for hours. The desk lamp was designed for people who read, write or work long hours in front of a computer.

🏠Sailstar's Desk Lamp for College Dorm Room: This dorm desk lamp is perfect for a college room and has an adjustable gooseneck, pen holder, and phone stand for optimum convenience. It serves several functions, which can help you save money and space. The holder can pack pens, pencils, multi-tools, reading glasses, or even a magnifying glass for you. A dorm desk lamp with storage will be a great addition to your desk.

✨Perfect for Any Space Desk Lamp: Multifunctional LED desk lamp with pen holder is absolutely a must-have item for office workspace, at-home desk area, or when sharing a room or dorm. Great for painting, puzzling, doing your nails or a small craft, or as a reading light. Kids desk lamps for school, enjoy up to 24 months of product care service. We will respond within 12 hours. Please feel free to let us know if you have any issues with the lamp.

If these black desk lamp can't charging my phone, what can I do? As the return window has been missed. Sailstar desk lamp provides 2-Year replacement promise, you can through amazon to let us know your problem. Please make sure your phone support wireless charger. Here are the steps: Go to the product page-Find the Sold& by“ Sailstar"-Ask& a question. I am looking for a wireless charger desk lamp for my husband, but I don't know what I need to notice. First, please make sure your cellphone supports wireless charging. The phone needs to be placed horizontally, and it can't be charged when the phone stands upright. Please do not use metal/magnetic phone cases that will affect wireless charging. I have a similar adapter in my house. Can I use the non-original adapter? The Sailstar desk lamp comes with an adapter. Please use the original adapter in the package. Using a non-original adapter may cause problems such as strobing light, reduced service life, causes the wireless charging to be slow. Can I charge my ipad or bluetooth earphones? The Sailstar wireless charger desk lamp does not have a USB port, so it can't charge an iPad or bluetooth headset. I want to know more about Wireless Charging. All products with wireless charging on the market have a probability of signal interference problems. When nearby a product that can transmit high-frequency signals, the wireless charging devices should be used away from this kind of product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very warm and bright light
reviews.reviewText: I was amazed how bright and warm this light is. The wireless charging is a great benefit - it holds the phone strongly in place and charges quickly. The desk lamp with a wireless phone charger seamlessly combines functionality and style. Its sleek design and adjustable brightness make it a perfect addition to any workspace or bedside table. The convenience of the wireless phone charger eliminates the hassle of tangled cords, providing a clutter-free environment. The lamp's build quality and modern features make it a practical and aesthetic choice for those seeking a versatile and efficient lighting solution with the added bonus of wireless charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a great addition to my bedroom gadgets
reviews.reviewText: I love this multipurpose table lamp. It has 3 light modes, a wireless phone charger, and a pen holder. It's very bright, but also dimmable to adjust to my needs through out the day. It's easy to use, sturdy, and a great addition to my bedroom. I highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the lamp. It is the perfect size for my small desk and is easy to use. It’s very light, which is surprising and great. The moveable lamp neck is perfect for when i need to adjust the angle of the light. It’s really bright too and fills my small room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing, versatile and practical!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Sailstar LED Desk Lamp is a versatile and practical addition to any home office or college dorm room. With its built-in wireless charger, you can conveniently charge your compatible devices while working or studying. The lamp offers three color modes, allowing you to adjust the lighting to suit your preference and task. The stepless dimming feature lets you control the brightness level precisely, creating a comfortable and personalized lighting environment.Moreover, with a high Color Rendering Index (CRI) of 85, this desk lamp ensures accurate and natural color representation, reducing eye strain during extended periods of use. Its 800 lumen output provides ample brightness for reading, writing, or working on projects.The added pen holder is a thoughtful design feature, keeping your writing utensils organized and within reach. The lamp's sleek and modern black design complements various decor styles, making it an aesthetic addition to any space.The included adapter makes setup easy and convenient, so you can start using the lamp right away. Overall, the Sailstar LED Desk Lamp is a practical, functional, and stylish choice for your study or work area, enhancing productivity and creating a pleasant environment for all your tasks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright and works well
reviews.reviewText: I actually purchased this for a nightstand, but in retrospect it really works better as a desk light. The lamp itself is not that tall which limits the functionality on the nightstand so I'll probably move this to my desk later.I selected this because of the built in containers that I wanted to use to hold misc items that clutter the top of the nightstand. The wireless charger is a plus but don't really use it. I think USB ports would be more useful and what I'll look for in my next lamp.The light itself is very bright but I don't make much use of the dimmer or different light modes. Overall it works well but is probably most useful in a smaller area like a desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: Different light degrees for different needs. Also has pen holder and cell phone charger (not used)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright LED Desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp is very bright and has an inbuilt pen holder that helps to keep your workspace tidy. It has 3 color options to suit individual needs and it allows you to adjust the brightness, not straining your eyes. A nice bonus is the ability to charge your phone wirelessly which further helps to reduce the clutter on the table.I have tried it with an iPhone. It is charging flawlessly and took about 45 mins to get to 100% charging. I have yet to try it with Android devices. will update here if it doesn't charge. Highly recommend it if I find no further issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The desk lamp has a variety of functions ,including mobile phone charging function ,and multiple brightness adjustable.The style is good- looking.I like a desk lamp very much.
Purchased for dorm room and it’s perfect! Storage for pens etc, wireless charger and a really good light

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice little lamp with othwr uses!
reviews.reviewText: Really like this lamp for my desk, very bright snd charges the phone wirelessly. Just awesome for the price
Looks great, well made and not too large . Multiple colors of light and levels.

For the price it is about what I expected. I wanted an area approximately 2’ x 2’ to cut fabric and this works well. The strength of the lighting isn’t going to exceed that area. It works for small areas but not much bigger. The size is important. I didn’t want a big base and I didn’t want the head of the light to be in the way so this works fine.
